title: Need special amumu skins
body: I have emumu, all most prom-King, little knight, and surprise party I'm looking for all the others. Tell me what u want in return for them

replies.body:
LOL theres no way to trade skins buddy. You just have to get lucky in a mystery gift or wait til the skins go back on sale.

I got Vancouver Amumu and Sad Robot Amumu from mystery gifts.
I gifted Vancouver Amumu to a friend last week, he was so happy then I think I made his life.
